item.title: Configure Red Hat or Fedora as a guest template
item.description: I have several tips how to configure Red Hat Enterprise Linux or Fedora as a guest template. That it an image used for fast provisioning of systems. My tips works with RHEL virtualization, RHEV hypervisor or any other virtualization technologies. Tip: Do not monitor virtual discs. Stop and disable disc SMART monitoring. Since discs are virtual, there is no need of monitoring them for hardware failures. Use smartd daemon on the host, but not guests.
